location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding a copy of a petition from Ibrahim, a native of Constantinople, to Sir Evan Nepean, dated August 1816, describing an attack by Joasamee [Qasimi] pirates on a boat in which he was travelling from Bussora [Basra] to Bushire and requesting assistance with the retrieval of the property he was robbed of.Warden requests that Bruce assist him in the matter.
